original: Bergdahl, Nils Axel Hjalmar, brandchef, Karlskrona, f. 25/11/08 i Karlskrona av kamr. Axel B. o. Anna Christiernson. G. 42 m. Ingrid Peterson. Barn: Ulf f. 43. — Stud:ex. i Karlskrona 28, res :off :ex. 31, Sv. brandskyddsfören. brandbef :sk. 33-34. Stud:res. t. Köpenhamn 33 o. 34, Ber-hn 35 o. 39, Hamburg 35, Helsingfors 46. Brandmäst. o. v. brandchef v. Kalmar brandkår 35-41, v. brandchef i Karlskrona 41-46, brandchef där sed. 46. Konsulent i Blek. 1. brandkårs-förb. sed. 41. Hobbies: fiske, ridning, pistolskjutning, jakt.
translated: Bergdahl, Nils Axel Hjalmar, fire chief, Karlskrona, born on November 25th, 1908 in Karlskrona to colleague Axel B. and Anna Christiernson. Married in 1942 to Ingrid Peterson, and they had one child, Ulf, born in 1943. He graduated from high school in Karlskrona in 1928, became a reserve officer in 1931, and underwent fire protection training in the Swedish Fire Protection Association in 1933-34. He studied abroad in Copenhagen in 1933-34, Berlin in 1935 and 1939, Hamburg in 1935, and Helsinki in 1946. He served as fire master and deputy fire chief for the Kalmar fire brigade from 1935 to 1941, as deputy fire chief in Karlskrona from 1941 to 1946, and as fire chief there since 1946. He also served as consultant to the Blekinge 1st Fire Brigade Association from 1941. His hobbies included fishing, horseback riding, pistol shooting, and hunting.
